column4: Hi! I have a question, please :) Can I update from Ubuntu 7.04 to Ubuntu 9.04 with only one update? (Maybe with the alternate CD? :) Thanks!
The instructions say that such a long upgrade isn't supported :(
:) thanks, "long upgrade" is only 1 more version? What can I do?
You could technically try to upgrade multiple steps to 8.10 and then 9.04, but that's grunky.  Probably better to back up your home dirs / stuff and get an install cd.
